title: The Matrix
synopsis: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
synopsis: A skilled thief enters people's dreams to steal secrets from their subconscious.

title: The Dark Knight
synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham
column6: Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

title: Interstellar
synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Pulp Fiction
synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen
column8: and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
